mapper.select:
select t.id, t.work_no, t.tool_name, t.technics_code, t.scheme_no, t.work_step, t.start_time, t.end_time, t.s, t.f, t.ap, t.fn, t.vc, t.fz, t.make_amount, t.waste_amount, t.recovery, t.qualified_amount, t.interrupt_reason, t.consume, t.consume_amount, t.sort, t.tenant_id, (select p.product_name from tams_product p where p.id=t.tool_name) as product_name, (select p.specification from tams_product p where p.id=t.tool_name) as product_specification, (select s.technics_name from tams_product_technics_scheme s where s.id=t.technics_code) as technics_name, (select s.code from tams_product_technics_scheme s where s.id=t.technics_code) as code from tams_user_feed_back t where 1=1
and t.create_by = '${create_by}'

select t.id, t.work_no as workNo, t.tool_name as toolName, t.technics_code as technicsCode, t.scheme_no as schemeNo, t.work_step as workStep, t.start_time as startTime, t.end_time as endTime, t.s, t.f, t.ap, t.fn, t.vc, t.fz, t.make_amount as makeAmount, t.waste_amount as wasteAmount, t.recovery, t.qualified_amount as qualifiedAmount, t.interrupt_reason as qualifiedAmount, t.consume, t.consume_amount as consumeAmount, t.sort, t.tenant_id, t.tool_component as toolComponent, (select p.product_name from tams_product p where p.id=t.tool_name) as product_name, (select p.specification from tams_product p where p.id=t.tool_name) as product_specification, (select s.technics_name from tams_product_technics_scheme s where s.id=t.technics_code) as technics_name, (select s.code from tams_product_technics_scheme s where s.id=t.technics_code) as code, (select w.step_no from tams_product_technics_scheme_work_step w where w.id=t.scheme_no) as process_name, (select w.step_no from tams_product_technics_scheme_work_step w where w.id=t.work_step) as workStep_name from tams_user_feed_back t where 1=1
and t.id = '${id}'

select a.product_label,a.scheme_code,a.amount,b.amount,c.amount, concat((a.amount-b.amount)/b.amount*100,'%') yoy, concat((a.amount-c.amount)/c.amount*100,'%') qoq, a.tool_cost,b.tool_cost,c.tool_cost, concat((a.tool_cost-b.tool_cost)/b.tool_cost*100,'%') cost_yoy, concat((a.tool_cost-c.tool_cost)/c.tool_cost*100,'%') cost_qoq from (select p.product_label,t.scheme_code,sum(s.amount) amount, sum(s.amount*e.tool_price) tool_cost from tams_user_feed_back b left join tams_product_technics_scheme t on b.TECHNICS_CODE = t.CODE left join tams_product p on t.product_id = p.id left join tams_product_technics_scheme_work_step s on b.work_step = s.id left join tams_tool l on s.tool_no = l.id left join tams_tool_price e on e.tool_id = l.id
and year(b.create_date) = year(#{date})
and year(b.create_date) = year(#{date}) and quarter(b.create_date) = quarter(#{date})
and year(b.create_date) = year(#{date}) and month(b.create_date) = month(#{date})
and year(b.create_date) = year(#{date}) and week(b.create_date) = week(#{date})
and year(b.create_date) = year(#{date}) and month(b.create_date) = month(#{date}) and day(b.create_date) = day(#{date})
group by t.id)a LEFT JOIN (select p.product_label,t.scheme_code,sum(s.amount) amount, sum(s.amount*e.tool_price) tool_cost from tams_user_feed_back b left join tams_product_technics_scheme t on b.technics_code = t.code left join tams_product p on t.product_id = p.id left join tams_product_technics_scheme_work_step s on b.work_step = s.id left join tams_tool l on s.tool_no = l.id left join tams_tool_price e on e.tool_id = l.id
and year(b.create_date) = year(date_sub(#{date},interval 1 year))
and year(b.create_date) = year(date_sub(#{date},interval 1 quarter)) and quarter(b.create_date) = quarter(date_sub(#{date},interval 1 quarter))
and year(b.create_date) = year(date_sub(#{date},interval 1 month)) and month(b.create_date) = month(date_sub(#{date},interval 1 month))
and year(b.create_date) = year(date_sub(#{date},interval 1 week)) and week(b.create_date) = week(date_sub(#{date},interval 1 week))
and year(b.create_date) = year(date_sub(#{date},interval 1 day)) and month(b.create_date) = month(date_sub(#{date},interval 1 day)) and day(b.create_date) = day(date_sub(#{date},interval 1 day))
group by t.id)b on a.scheme_code = b.scheme_code left join (select p.product_label,t.scheme_code,sum(s.amount) amount, sum(s.amount*e.tool_price) tool_cost from tams_user_feed_back b left join tams_product_technics_scheme t on b.technics_code = t.code left join tams_product p on t.product_id = p.id left join tams_product_technics_scheme_work_step s on b.work_step = s.id left join tams_tool l on s.tool_no = l.id left join tams_tool_price e on e.tool_id = l.id
and year(b.create_date) = year(date_sub(#{date},interval 1 year))
and year(b.create_date) = year(date_sub(#{date},interval 1 year)) and quarter(b.create_date) = quarter(date_sub(#{date},interval 1 year))
and year(b.create_date) = year(date_sub(#{date},interval 1 year)) and month(b.create_date) = month(date_sub(#{date},interval 1 year))
and year(b.create_date) = year(date_sub(#{date},interval 1 year)) and week(b.create_date) = week(date_sub(#{date},interval 1 year))
and year(b.create_date) = year(date_sub(#{date},interval 1 month)) and month(b.create_date) = month(date_sub(#{date},interval 1 month)) and day(b.create_date) = day(date_sub(#{date},interval 1 month))
group by t.id)c on a.scheme_code = c.scheme_code order by a.amount desc

select sum(b.qualified_amount) qualified_amount,sum(b.waste_amount) waste_amount,sum(b.make_amount) make_amount
,date_format(b.create_date,'%Y') date
,concat(year(b.create_date),'年',quarter(b.create_date),'季度') date
,date_format(b.create_date,'%Y-%m') date
,concat(year(b.create_date),'年',week(b.create_date),'周') date
,date_format(b.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') date
from tams_user_feed_back b
and b.create_date >= #{begin_date}
and b.create_date <= #{end_date}
group by date_format(b.create_date,'%Y')
group by concat(year(b.create_date),'年',quarter(b.create_date),'季度')
group by date_format(b.create_date,'%Y-%m')
group by concat(year(b.create_date),'年',week(b.create_date),'周')
group by date_format(b.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d')

select sum(b.qualified_amount) qualified_amount,sum(b.waste_amount) waste_amount,sum(b.make_amount) make_amount,b.technics_code technics_code
,date_format(b.create_date,'%Y') date
,concat(year(b.create_date),'年',quarter(b.create_date),'季度') date
,date_format(b.create_date,'%Y-%m') date
,concat(year(b.create_date),'年',week(b.create_date),'周') date
,date_format(b.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') date
from tams_user_feed_back b left join tams_product_technics_scheme t on b.technics_code = t.code left join tams_product p on t.product_id = p.id
and b.create_date >= #{begin_date}
and b.create_date <= #{end_date}
and p.id = #{product_id}
group by date_format(b.create_date,'%Y')
group by concat(year(b.create_date),'年',quarter(b.create_date),'季度')
group by date_format(b.create_date,'%Y-%m')
group by concat(year(b.create_date),'年',week(b.create_date),'周')
group by date_format(b.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d')

select p.product_label,t.technics_name,sum(s.amount) amount,sum(s.amount*e.tool_price) tool_cost
,date_format(b.create_date,'%Y') date
,concat(year(b.create_date),'年',quarter(b.create_date),'季度') date
,date_format(b.create_date,'%Y-%m') date
,concat(year(b.create_date),'年',week(b.create_date),'周') date
,date_format(b.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') date
from tams_user_feed_back b left join tams_product_technics_scheme t on b.technics_code = t.code left join tams_product p on t.product_id = p.id left join tams_product_technics_scheme_work_step s on b.work_step = s.id left join tams_tool l on s.tool_no = l.id left join tams_tool_price e on e.tool_id = l.id
and b.create_date >= #{begin_date}
and b.create_date <= #{end_date}
and p.id = #{product_id}
group by date_format(b.create_date,'%Y')
group by concat(year(b.create_date),'年',quarter(b.create_date),'季度')
group by date_format(b.create_date,'%Y-%m')
group by concat(year(b.create_date),'年',week(b.create_date),'周')
group by date_format(b.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d')
order by date

select sum(s.amount) amount,sum(s.amount*e.tool_price) tool_cost
,date_format(b.create_date,'%Y') date
,concat(year(b.create_date),'年',quarter(b.create_date),'季度') date
,date_format(b.create_date,'%Y-%m') date
,concat(year(b.create_date),'年',week(b.create_date),'周') date
,date_format(b.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') date
from tams_user_feed_back b left join tams_product_technics_scheme_work_step s on b.work_step = s.id left join tams_tool l on s.tool_no = l.id left join tams_tool_price e on e.tool_id = l.id
and b.create_date >= #{begin_date}
and b.create_date <= #{end_date}
group by date_format(b.create_date,'%Y')
group by concat(year(b.create_date),'年',quarter(b.create_date),'季度')
group by date_format(b.create_date,'%Y-%m')
group by concat(year(b.create_date),'年',week(b.create_date),'周')
group by date_format(b.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d')
order by date
